item.description:
Review 2009 - Welcome in 2010

This evening has been presented for 25 years. There's plenty of time to reflect and share (as an option) about what happened to you in 2009 and what you learned and to focus on qualities and goals for 2010. There's several ceremonies, in candlelight and gifts. It's a special experience. Repeated on 30th and also the 1st of January.

Traditional cost $40 - sliding scale to $20

Optional vegetarian potluck at 6pm

Workshop 7-10pm

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship and personal coach who works with relationship and personality dynamics for individuals, couples and families. The author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, he teaches many workshops on the Enneagram, Myers-Briggs, personal and spiritual development, self esteem and communication and relationship dynamics. He travels to teach in New England and the United States and also does trainings for organizations on team building and the effective use of personality differences.

www.herbpearce.com - email to receive my free email newsletter
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Reflect on 2009 - Welcome in 2010
